rows: Type of reward system (e.g., Points, Cashback).
Name of the rewards or loyalty program.
Number of points earned by the cardholder.
Number of points redeemed to date.
Calculated as Total Earned − Redeemed. Indicates remaining reward points.
Indicates the date on which the earned reward points expire.
html:
Field

Description

Program type

Type of reward system (e.g., Points, Cashback).

Program name

Name of the rewards or loyalty program.

Total earned points

Number of points earned by the cardholder.

Redeemed points

Number of points redeemed to date.

Available points

Calculated as Total Earned − Redeemed. Indicates remaining reward points.

Points expiration date

Indicates the date on which the earned reward points expire.
